name: Proactive Health Check
description: Run proactive monitoring analysis when new metrics are available
agent_prompt:
New infrastructure metrics have been collected. Please:
1. Analyze the metrics for anomalies and trends
2. Identify the top 3 most critical issues requiring attention
3. Generate preventive action recommendations
4. Assess business impact and urgency

Use your autonomous monitoring capabilities to make decisions about alert severity and required actions. Provide clear reasoning for your recommendations.
